deck module¶

class deck.Deck(modules)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Deck class is a representation of the robot deck

The Deck class is intended to be instantiated to a deck object which contains the subclassed deck modules labeled by slot #. Slot numbers are integers from 1 to 15, starting from the front-left slot and ending with the back-right slot as follows:

3 6 9 12 15
2 5 8 11 14
1 4 7 10 13
configure_deck(deck_data)[source]¶

Load deck modules specified in protocol.json file

deck_data = dictionary containing the module data. :returns: A list of instantiated deck modules :rtype: List
